summary: An ordinance providing for The Alley in Block 4, Gardner J. Gwinn Addition, being the alley between Roosevelt Way and 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 78th Street to East 80th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14059 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
